about_the_game:
Note: The base game is required to play this DLC. Please ensure that your game is updated to the latest version.

As the horns of war grow ever louder, Vikings relentlessly wage battles and pillage everything their axes can reach. With each settlement they conquer, they capture their enemies, using them to bolster the strength and efficiency of their own domains.

Land of the Vikings' Thralls introduces a new layer of strategic management, enabling you to capture foes as you venture into the outer world. These captured foes, known as thralls, can be assigned to various tasks within your settlements, from mining to helping to produce food, fabric, and battle armor. Their efforts will be crucial as you fortify your settlement's might and efficiency.

Thrall System: A New Strategic Dimension

Experience a new strategic layer with the thrall system, a core element of war and exploration. Capture enemies as thralls and employ them within your settlements, boosting resource production and further developing your economy.

Thrall Management House: Your New Center

Effectively manage your thralls with the new Thrall Management Houses. These hubs allow you to assign and oversee thralls, but be sure to maintain their happiness to improve your settlement's overall well-being, or risk the thralls revolting against you.

New Events: The Stories of Thralls

The thrall system introduces new events and personal stories of your thralls. Hold events for your thralls regularly to maximize your thralls’ happiness and productivity, and watch as their stories unfold within your settlement.
